name: Framed Inventory Cable
pages: The framed inventory cable is used to connect inventories across long distances and can be painted. $(l:patchouli:connectors/inventory_cable_connector)Inventory cable connecters/$  have to be used to attach inventories. One $(l:patchouli:blocks/inventory_connector)inventory connector/$ must be present in the network. Additionally it requires a $(l:patchouli:cables/inventory_cable)inventory cable/$ in its recipe
